name: Paint Blocks!
description:
Best played in full-screen and with controllers

Build 3 of a local multiplayer game. 2-4 players go head-to-head (-to-head (-to-head)) in an effort to paint the floor with their color. First player to get three round victories wins the game. Only 2 players if using keyboard, but up to 4 players with four controllers. 

Keyboard controls: 

Player 1 - WASD for movement, hold space to ready up.

Player 2 - Arrow keys for movement, hold return to ready up.

Right-click with mouse to open pause menu.

Xbox Controller controls:

D-Pad for movement, hold A to ready up.

Press the start button to open pause menu.

Future builds with bug fixes and more content to come later.
